name: China
description: Study in one of the world's fastest-growing economies with a 5,000-year-old civilization. Experience cutting-edge technology, world-class universities, and an unforgettable cultural journey.

whyStudyHere.title: World-Class Education
whyStudyHere.description: Home to 7 universities in the world's top 100, China offers exceptional academic programs recognized globally.

whyStudyHere.title: Affordable Tuition
whyStudyHere.description: Study at top-ranked universities for a fraction of Western costs, with numerous scholarship opportunities available.

whyStudyHere.title: Rich Cultural Heritage
whyStudyHere.description: Experience 5,000 years of history, from the Great Wall to modern skyscrapers in the world's oldest continuous civilization.

whyStudyHere.title: Career Opportunities
whyStudyHere.description: Build valuable connections in the world's second-largest economy and gain a competitive edge in the global job market.

whyStudyHere.title: Modern Infrastructure
whyStudyHere.description: Enjoy state-of-the-art facilities, high-speed rail, and smart cities with advanced technology integration.

whyStudyHere.title: Diverse Experiences
whyStudyHere.description: From bustling megacities to serene countryside, explore incredibly diverse landscapes and experiences.

topUniversities: University of Science and Technology of China

name: Hungary
description: Discover quality European education at affordable prices in the heart of Central Europe. Hungary offers world-renowned medical programs, rich culture, and a gateway to explore Europe.

whyStudyHere.title: EU Member Benefits
whyStudyHere.description: Study in the European Union with access to the Schengen Zone and travel opportunities across 26 European countries.

whyStudyHere.title: Medical Excellence
whyStudyHere.description: Home to some of Europe's best medical schools with programs recognized by WHO, EU, and major medical councils worldwide.

whyStudyHere.title: Affordable Living
whyStudyHere.description: Experience European lifestyle at much lower costs compared to Western Europe, with excellent quality of life.

whyStudyHere.title: Central Location
whyStudyHere.description: Perfect base to explore Europe - Vienna, Prague, and other major cities are just hours away.

whyStudyHere.title: Rich Culture
whyStudyHere.description: Immerse yourself in thermal baths, classical music, stunning architecture, and vibrant festivals.

whyStudyHere.title: English Programs
whyStudyHere.description: Wide range of English-taught programs across medicine, engineering, business, and arts.

topUniversities: Budapest University of Technology and Economics
studentLife: Rich cultural scene with opera and concerts

undergraduate: High school diploma with science subjects

name: Italy
description: Study in the birthplace of the Renaissance, home to world-famous art, culture, and cuisine. Italy offers prestigious universities, innovative programs, and an unparalleled lifestyle experience.

whyStudyHere.title: Historic Universities
whyStudyHere.description: Study at some of the world's oldest universities, including Bologna (founded 1088) with centuries of academic excellence.

whyStudyHere.title: Design & Arts Capital
whyStudyHere.description: World leader in fashion, design, architecture, and fine arts with unmatched creative opportunities.

whyStudyHere.title: EU Education Quality
whyStudyHere.description: Bologna Process education system recognized across Europe with affordable tuition at public universities.

whyStudyHere.title: Culinary Excellence
whyStudyHere.description: Experience authentic Italian cuisine, wine culture, and Mediterranean lifestyle in the food capital of the world.

whyStudyHere.title: Cultural Heritage
whyStudyHere.description: Live among UNESCO World Heritage sites, ancient ruins, Renaissance art, and breathtaking landscapes.

whyStudyHere.title: Strategic Location
whyStudyHere.description: Gateway to Europe, Mediterranean, and North Africa with excellent connectivity and travel opportunities.

undergraduate: High school diploma (12 years of education)
